title:
Back To The Future: A Hybrid Transformer-XGBoost Model for
  Action-oriented Future-proofing Nowcasting
abstract:
Inspired by the iconic movie Back to the Future, this paper explores an
innovative adaptive nowcasting approach that reimagines the relationship
between present actions and future outcomes. In the movie, characters travel
through time to manipulate past events, aiming to create a better future.
Analogously, our framework employs predictive insights about the future to
inform and adjust present conditions. This dual-stage model integrates the
forecasting power of Transformers (future visionary) with the interpretability
and efficiency of XGBoost (decision maker), enabling a seamless loop of future
prediction and present adaptation. Through experimentation with meteorological
datasets, we demonstrate the framework's advantage in achieving more accurate
forecasting while guiding actionable interventions for real-time applications.
